title: Deceased domicile
question: Did the person who died live permanently in England or Wales, or intend to return here?
hintText1: You can only apply for probate online if the person who died was domiciled in England or Wales at the time of their death.
legend: Did the person who died live permanently in England or Wales, or intend to return here?

required.summary: Answer the question about whether the person who died lived permanently in England and Wales
required.message: Select yes if the person who died lived in England and Wales or intended to return here
